caption:
b'This week at Automation Fair At Home has brought us the top innovations in industry and insights from forward-thinking thought leaders - all from the comfort and safety of our home offices. Now, get a look behind the scenes of our Virtual Tours, produced at our headquarters. Swipe through to see the "before"!
.
.
.
#automationfair #virtualevent #workfromhome #roklive'

b'Join us Monday through Wednesday during Automation Fair At Home for exclusive talks at Perspectives. The Perspectives keynote presentations will feature executive leadership, Partners and industry experts sharing their thoughts, visions, strategies and real-life business experiences that are driving information technology/operational technology convergence to deliver The Connected Enterprise.
.
Learn more and register: rok.auto/AutomationFair20
.
.
.
#IT #OT #virtualevent #automationfair'

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s no secret that inclusion and diversity are good for business. Join our Automation Fair Bold Conversations to hear from thought-leaders discussing how culture, community outreach, supplier diversity and a focus on talent can impact your bottom line. Learn more: rok.auto/3ktoT52 
.
.
.
#diversityandinclusion #culture #diversitymatters'

b'Automation plays an important role in the water industry\xe2\x80\x99s transformation to achieve a Connected Water Plant. In the Water Wastewater forum, the audience will hear from panelists about the impact of digital transformation on plant infrastructure, operations and their workforce. Learn more: rok.auto/AFwater
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #water #wastewater #automationfair'

b'The power and energy industry continues to be dynamic with increasing production demands, the greening of fuel sources and the complex compliance requirements. Hear leading companies and industry specialists demonstrate how they are leveraging our technology and solutions to manage new challenges to achieve a competitive advantage. Learn more: rok.auto/AFpower
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #power #energy #automationfair'

b'The current pace of change in the life sciences industry is both exciting and extraordinary, opening opportunities for life sciences companies to better serve more people around the world with increasingly innovative and affordable diagnostics, treatments, combination devices and cures. Join industry leaders at the Life Sciences forum who are implementing digital transformation strategies to help improve patient lives. Learn more: rok.auto/AFlifescience
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #lifesciences #automationfair'

b"What's next for the mining industry? Join the moderated panel discussion that brings together industry experts to their real life experiences on how innovation has impacted their operations, the challenges they\xe2\x80\x99re facing and the benefits they\xe2\x80\x99ve seen - all in the Mining Forum. Learn more: rok.auto/AFmining
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #mining #automationfair"

b'As machine and equipment builders around the world are challenged to sell, design, commission and service from afar, your \xe2\x80\x9cnext\xe2\x80\x9d is closer than ever. Join us at the OEM Forum for a panel discussion featuring OEMs who have embraced the new way of doing business and spurred reinvention in response to this challenge. Learn more: rok.auto/AFoem
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #OEM #automationfair'

b'The accelerating adoption of digital technologies to safely and efficiently run operations in the new normal has become a requirement to maintain a competitive advantage. Join the panel at the Chemical Forum, bringing together a variety of industry experts to discuss how digitalization can be rapidly achieved with the right technology, smart assets and planning to provide lasting business value. Learn more: rok.auto/AFchemicals
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #chemical #automationfair'

b'The metals industry has long faced an uphill battle when it comes to modernization. The moderated panel discussion at the Metals Forum brings together industry experts to engage in conversation and bring real life examples on how innovation has impacted their operations, the challenges they\xe2\x80\x99re facing and the benefits they\xe2\x80\x99ve seen. Learn more: rok.auto/AFmetals
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #metals #automationfair'

b'Learn how leading companies in the automotive and tire sectors are launching new vehicles, production plants and equipment lines using digital solutions during one of the most challenging times in years. Learn more: rok.auto/AFautotire
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #automationfair #autoandtire #EV'

b'Learn how leading companies in the automotive and tire sectors are launching new vehicles, production plants and equipment lines using digital solutions during one of the most challenging times in years. Learn more: rok.auto/AFautotire
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #automationfair #autoandtire #EV'

b'Attend the Food and Beverage Industry Forum  at Automation Fair At Home and hear from industry leaders who found innovative ways to leverage technology to improve performance, overcome security concerns, manage remote work and meet consumer demands.  Learn more: rok.auto/AFfoodbev
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #foodandbeverage #automationfair'

b'The oil and gas industry has experienced extreme volatility in the last few years: from oversupply and low prices to limited financial resources and more recently the challenges of managing operations in person. This forum will discuss the industry\xe2\x80\x99s needs and the capabilities of its suppliers to deploy digital technologies and deliver advanced automation to achieve better operational efficiencies. Learn more: rok.auto/AFoilgas
.
.
.
.
#ROKLive #oilandgas #automationfair'

b"We're throwing it back to last year at the Academy of Advanced Manufacturing to celebrate the end of #ManufacturingMonth.
.
In partnership with @ManpowerGroupUS, we've committed to bridging the skills gap in manufacturing roles, and this is a great example of that in action. Hear from graduates on the Academy of Advanced Manufacturing program and how it has helped them succeed in the industry.
.
Note: this video was recorded in 2019
.
#AAM #mfg  #advancedmanufacturing #skillsgap #throwback"

b'Ever wonder how your favorite sweet treats end up in multi-flavor packs? Join us at PACK EXPO Connects this November to learn more about the latest innovative and flexible packaging solutions.
.
Learn more: rok.auto/2GYVwZw
.
.
.
#sweettreats #packaging #virtualevent #ROKLive'

b'We are proud to announce the early extension of our strategic alliance with @ptc_inc to continue innovating #digitaltransformation solutions and #expandinghumanpossibility together.\n.\nLearn more about our expanded partnership here, or at the link in bio: rok.auto/35KGKhJ'

b'Are you planning your schedule for Automation Fair At Home?  With over 165 sessions to choose from, we know you\xe2\x80\x99ll find a list of sessions you won\xe2\x80\x99t want to miss. Register now and view the session catalog to plan your week.'

b"Calling all students! :loudspeaker:
.
We're proud to sponsor @shopfloornam's @mfgday virtual event this year. And it is LIVE today at 12 pm ET!
.
Join the host, our STEM Ambassador @jayfloresinspires, for conversations with special guests like @thespacegal, and even take a virtual tour of our facilities, following the creation of a product from beginning to end.
.
Learn more now at creatorswanted.org!
.
.
.
#MFGDay20 #manufacturingday #manufacturingmonth"

b'Automation Fair At Home registration is open! Register today to experience a virtual world-class event featuring the newest solutions and innovations, the opportunity to interact with technology experts and executives, participate in engaging hands-on labs, training sessions, industry focused forums, keynote presentations, and network with leading professionals in the field.
 
Check it out here :right_arrow_selector:https://rok.auto/2EpxLcd
.
Be sure to follow along with our live event hashtag, #ROKLive, to get regular updates on our Automation Fair At Home event and our PSUG At Home event!'

b"Please join us in congratulating all participants in the #24toCode hackathon! This event was the first virtual contest of its kind to develop creative business solutions, and we're excited to celebrate these tech innovators. Congrats to our hackathon winners and to all who participated.
.
The hackathon event, held from September 17-19, and in partnership with @Cisco, provided a virtual forum for technology, software coding and programming teams globally to apply their problem-solving skills to real-world challenges that affect the industrial software and automation industry.
.
.
.
#hackathon #coding #softwareengineers"

b'We are honored to receive the Diversity & Inclusion Program Award from @SWEtalk!
.
This award recognizes our dedication to a culture of inclusion and highlighting the impact and importance of #womeninengineering around the world :globe_showing_Americas:
.
Read the full story: rok.auto/34b1EG6
.
.
.
#WomenInSTEM #steminist #rockwellautomation'

b"We're pleased to announce Isaac Woods as vice president, treasurer, and board-elected officer of the company. We look forward to Isaac\xe2\x80\x99s contributions as a member of our leadership team, and his support of our long-term strategic goals."

b'The #24toCode Hackathon took place this weekend, and it was exciting to see many of the participants enjoying their swag boxes.  If you were one of participants of the hackathon social media contest, you could be the lucky contest winner.  Check your Instagram messages to find out if you won!
.
.
.
.
24toCode social media contest rules:
Hackathon Participants: Post a photo or video of you opening and enjoying your swag box with\xc2\xa0#24toCode & tag @ROKAutomation to be entered to win
Contest runs from August 17th 2020 through September 20th 2020.
If your post is selected as a winner, Rockwell Automation will award one randomly selected winner on September 21st 2020 and will contact you by direct message on Instagram requesting that you provide shipping information for receipt of the prize.
If you are not a selected winner, Rockwell Automation will not sell, use, repurpose or reuse your photo(s)/video(s) on social media or in any other medium or outlet.
Contest is open to residents of the United States of America.
Participants must be 18 or older to enter or win.'
b'Check out this visual systems and modernization challenge our #24toCode participants will be tackling! Stay tuned to our Instagram stories to watch the power of code solve real world problems.'

b'Do you dream of making a difference in the world? :globe_showing_Americas: Our planet is calling for your innovative thinking skills. Register for #24toCode today to learn how you can take the first step toward decreasing the carbon footprint in the world of industrial automation.\nhttps://rok.auto/2EQETik'

b'Ready to change the game? Tune into FIRST\xe2\x80\x99s Instagram LIVE on the 17th to hear our STEM Ambassador @jayfloresinspires interview inspiring game changers in sports!
.
#Repost @first_official_ with @make_repost
\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb\xe3\x83\xbb
To celebrate the FIRST GAME CHANGERS powered by Star Wars: Force for Change season, we're teaming up with Rockwell Automation's Global STEM Ambassador @jayfloresinspires to bring you live conversations with the people who are changing the game in the world of sports!

Tune in starting at 8PM ET September 17 on FIRST\xe2\x80\x99s Instagram LIVE for "Changing the Game," powered by @rokautomation, and an exciting interview with our first featured guest, Parkour specialist and recent FOX \xe2\x80\x9cUltimate Tag!\xe2\x80\x9d star, @lorenaparkour (Lorena Abreu).

Leave your questions in the comments below and watch the Instagram LIVE stream to participate in the conversation in real time! #FIRSTGAMECHANGERS'

b"Here's a quick look at one of the use cases for our upcoming hackathon. Register for #24toCode today to take on the challenge of making a real difference in the world of industrial IOT with software and controls, and data and insights.\nLearn more here :right_arrow_selector: https://rok.auto/2EQETik"

b'Hey #Engineers! Have you heard of the new scalable Compact GuardLogix 5380 SIL 3 controller? The controller helps you meet demanding safety requirements up to SIL 3/PLe rating and right-size your safety control needs. Check it out :right_arrow_selector: https://rok.auto/31OFdW2\n.\n#newproductsrok #guardmaster #manufacturing #mfg'

b'Wanted: An innovator who digs data. Register for the #24toCode Hackathon where you will join a team to solve real-world manufacturing optimization challenges for a chance to win cash prizes!\n:right_arrow_selector:rok.auto/24toCode'

b'Did you know? Intrinsic safety is the preferred protection method for applications in hazardous areas. Learn how our intrinsically safe 1718 Ex I/O platform helps you maximize efficiency and satisfy Zone 1 application requirements. https://www.rockwellautomation.com/en-us/products/hardware/allen-bradley/i-o/in-cabinet-modular-i-o/1718-ex-i-o.html'

b'Looking for ways to simplify HART device configuration and improve operational efficiency? FLEX 5000 HART I/O with Premier Integration is one solution! https://www.rockwellautomation.com/en-us/products/hardware/allen-bradley/i-o/in-cabinet-modular-i-o/5094-flex-5000-i-o-modules.html'

b"Combine this innate curiosity with the potential of technology and you can expand human possibility.
.
From enhancing a simple everyday encounter at the gas station behind the scenes to providing the ability for manufacturers to adapt when crisis strikes - this is what we're all about.
.

.
.

#PetroleumDay #Innovation #Curiosity #RockwellAutomation #ExpandingHumanPossibility"

.
.
.
#4thofjuly #independenceday #inthistogether"

b'Did you know that June is #AMCAwarenessMonth? We\xe2\x80\x99re so proud to hear from our very own employees that our culture of inclusion has created the perfect environment for everyone to want to bring their very best to work each day. Listen to this inspiring story from Rachel, manager of employee engagement, about how she found her passion and purpose right here at Rockwell Automation.  #LifeAtROK'

b"For the 8th consecutive year, we've been recognized as one of the best places to work for LGBTQ+ equality by the @humanrightscampaign! :rainbow_flag_selector: We're proud of this achievement, but even prouder that our ROKStars feel safe to be who they are at work. Swipe through and see what they have to say. :right_arrow_selector:
.
.
.
.
.
#happypride #pridemonth #june26 #marriageequality #diversityandinclusion"

b"#CuriousPeopleWonder how manufacturers are rising to the challenge of increased need for test kit production during the health crisis.
.
#FlexibleManufacturing solutions are the key to helping customers pivot their operations to respond, and Lanco Integrated is a perfect example.
.
Not only have they found ways to dramatically reduce delivery times, but they've also reduced build times by 50% for machines that produce test kits, using our automation solutions. Learn more: rok.auto/37wGW4M .
.
.
.
#healthheroes #pandemic #covid19 #happyending #testkits #positivity #rockwellautomation #expandinghumanpossibility"

b'When a drive or servo motor goes down on your line, is your production disrupted? Our remanufacturing team can help you minimize the interruption. #AllenBradley\n.\nLearn more at rok.auto/remanufacturing'

b'From a roller coaster expert to  @first_official_  alumni, these #WomenROK! Swipe through and read inspirational quotes from these #STEM advocates for #InternationalWomenInEngineeringDay!
.
Sandra Kenly, Commodity Manager: "I\xe2\x80\x99m a huge advocate for women in STEM as it is the foundation of our future and Women are the Future! Dream big."
.
Sarah Fogwell, Digital Engagement, Digital Portfolio Team: "I got involved with FIRST as a student, trying to defy the social norms that come with being a high school girl. I hope that young ladies (and gentlemen) see the path that FIRST has set me on..."
.
Dina Nabutovsky, Engineer Associate: "I feel like it's a stereotype that you have to be identified as \xe2\x80\x98super smart\xe2\x80\x99 or \xe2\x80\x98a genius\xe2\x80\x99 to go into STEM fields. Although it's challenging, EVERYTHING will have its challenges."
.
Linda Freeman, Manager, Regional Industry: "I'm very passionate about inspiring our next generation of technologists to work in manufacturing."
.
Lining Huang, Senior Product Specialist: "I believe engineering and technology make a huge difference in our lives and therefore inspiring the next generation of children to be involved in STEM is paramount."
.
Kerryn Sakko, Solutions Consultant: "I believe that the younger we expose children to STEM, the more informed they can be about potential careers."
.
.
.
.
#WomenInSTEM #GirlsInSTEM #DiversityInclusion #DiversityAndInclusion'

b'Congratulations to our very own Global Supply Chain Communications and Messaging Manager, Darice Brown, for being named to the Empower 100 Ethnic Minority Future Leaders List of 2020.  Darice is a leader in our global strategy to positively impact diversity and inclusion efforts to attract, retain and nurture diverse talent, and is recognized for her work in creating an environment where ethnic minority employees can comfortably bring their best professional selves to work each day.'

We offer a dynamic community where you can build a thriving career solving complex problems that have an impact on our customers, industries and the world. \nVisit www.rockwellautomation.com/careers to explore available opportunities.'

b'#CuriousPeopleWonder how hospitals are adjusting to the increased need for safe, efficient adult intensive care units during this time. :medical_symbol_selector:
.
At the heart of the crisis in New York, Lenox Hill Hospital is adapting its operations with the help of Arena Simulation software, allowing #healthcare decision-makers to proactively plan & anticipate the flow and restraints of their resources.
.
This innovative solution has helped Lenox Hill convert its pediatric outpatient surgery area to accommodate the rapidly evolving health crisis and ultimately, save more lives. :beating_heart: Read more at the #linkinbio or here: rok.auto/2X7aeCh .
.
.
#healthcareheroes #inthistogether #automation #lenoxhill #saferathome'

b"Bored at home? Then you need this awesome board game from @STMath! :penguin: In fact, you can enter to win one FREE right now (U.S. only).
.
South of the Sahara is an educational family board game from MIND Research Institute that uses math, history & literacy to help students learn, problem-solve and of course have fun! :jigsaw: If you're a parent who just started homeschooling due to today's circumstances, this game is for you. It's easy to enter, just follow the steps below:
.
:white_heavy_check_mark: Follow @stmath
:white_heavy_check_mark: Like this post
:white_heavy_check_mark: Tag a friend in the comments of this post, maybe someone who might also be interested in winning this fun, educational board game
.
Two winners will be chosen randomly and DM'd soon, good luck!
.
.
.
#STEMeducation #giveaway #gamegiveaway #educationalgames"

b'It\xe2\x80\x99s #teacherappreciationday and we\xe2\x80\x99re shouting out to all teachers who have been adjusting to today\xe2\x80\x99s circumstances.  We wish a wonderful day full of learning to all teachers (and new homeschooling teachers). b"It's #MathMonday, and we're teaming up with our partners at @stmath from the MIND Research Institute to help make math fun & accessible - especially if you're an honorary math teacher who could brush up on their Number Sense! :red_apple:
.
Every Monday, check out our Stories for fun mathematics definitions & explanations, and don't forget to try out ST Math for FREE :right_arrow_selector: stmath.com/coronavirus
.
Need more math-spiration? Follow our STEM Ambassador's page @jayfloresinspires for tips, games & even giveaways to come."

b'Gain more value from your production assets, systems and processes so you can continue #expandinghumanpossibility. Our Lifecycle Services combine expertise and technology to enable safe, secure and reliable manufacturing. We\xe2\x80\x99re here to help support you. #InThisTogether'

b"No one can plan for the unexpected, but with helping hands, we are all adapting. So, it's a good thing you're here because you have all made a difference in these difficult times. From running plant floors to running your households, we are grateful for the sacrifice of your time and reminded that we are #InThisTogether.
#ThankfulThursday
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Poem by @davidfamous"

b"In times like these there\xe2\x80\x99s no time to waste, and our teams react quickly to emergencies.
.
In just 4 hours, our ROK-stars got a drive out the door for an expedited request to keep a water tower running for 30,000 people. :droplet: We are here for you.
.
This #ThankfulThursday, we're proud of our Mequon team for preventing a water supply disaster & #expandinghumanpossibility.
.
.
.
#makingadifference #cleanwater #waterwastewater #rockwellautomation"

b"Fifty years ago,\xc2\xa0#EarthDay\xc2\xa0began as a unified response to an environment in crisis. While we're #TogetherAtHome fifty years later, we are reminded that though we are in a moment of crisis, honoring the Earth and the life it brings to our communities can make us #StrongerTogether :rainbow:
:globe_showing_Americas:
This wonderful world connects us, even when we're apart, and reminds us that no matter what, we're #InThisTogether.
:globe_showing_Europe-Africa:
Let us know in the comments how you're celebrating this Earth Day!
:globe_showing_Asia-Australia:
.
.
#whatawonderfulworld #earthday2020 #rockwellautomation #earthday50 #sustainability #greenroof"

b'Now more than ever, people are depending on our products, and because of that, we are depending on you. Thank You.
.
Clocktower photo credits: Photographer Peter Zuzga
.
.
.
#InThisTogether #ThankfulThursday'

b"With the cancellation of many events, it's good to know imagination can never be canceled.
.
We want to feature you and your big ideas in our Instagram Stories. Need inspiration? Share a pic of your new work-from-home setup or post about the innovative ways you're helping out in your community during this time, like 3D-printing PPEs!
.
Tag us @rokautomation in your post or use one of our brand hashtags like #ExpandingHumanPossibility or #CuriousPeopleWonder. Then, look out for a weekly roundup of our favorite Instagram moments on our Stories - you might even see your post!"

b"At the end of long days like these, everyone deserves their favorite brew. :beer_mug: \xc2\xa0We hope you're enjoying #nationalbeerday!
.
#CuriousPeopleWonder what keeps your favorite flavors consistent from sip to sip. With retail beer taking the lead during social distancing, using automation to increase production comes in handy. Watch how @mkebrewco keeps the art of craft brewing alive while maintaining & innovating signature tastes, smells and flavors - simultaneously.
.
MKE Brewing Co. founder Jim McCabe reflects on his love for #craftbrewing and turning his dream into a reality with the help of brewing process automation."

b"We're all in this together. At Rockwell Automation, we are focused on the health and safety of our employees, families and customers. Read our full message to customers and partners here or at the link in bio: rok.auto/2QsnPli
.
.
.
Clocktower photo credits: Photographer Peter Zuzga"

b'Happy #piday! We hope you take a moment to enjoy how sweet this day can be.  Here\xe2\x80\x99s a small selection of the pies we celebrated with this past week. :speech_balloon:Comment to let us know which pie :pie: you would like best!\n.\n#pieday #314day #nationalpieday #lifeatrok'

b"We're proud of all the @first_official_ teams and mentors for the amazing work they've done this season.  Let's hear it for these builders, makers and innovators. Here's some of our favorite moments from this season, featuring our STEM ambassador @jayfloresinspires :robot_face:"

b"The @first_official_ Wisconsin Regionals are ahead of us and #IWD2020 is behind us - but there's no time like the present to combine the two and celebrate #WomenInSTEM with today's #TechTuesday: STEMinist :female_sign_selector:
.
A STEMinist is someone who advocates for girls & women in STEM, from finding their passion to growing in their careers! Are you a #STEMinist?
.
Our favorite STEMinist is our STEM Ambassador @jayfloresinspires, who is always finding ways to encourage students, especially girls in STEM, to contribute their best ideas to improve our :globe_showing_Americas: with his involvement in programs like @thefrcteam.
.
.
.
#STEMEducation #WomensMonth #InfiniteRecharge #MoreThanRobots #FIRSTRobotics #rockwellautomation"

b'With #InternationalWomensDay on Sunday, we're featuring  women paving the way for women at our company, like Rebecca Ball.
.
Rebecca is the first woman to hold the title of CSM country manager in EMEA. Often she is the only woman in a meeting or on a team \xe2\x80\x93 and that\xe2\x80\x99s something she wants to change.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cWe need more women in the talent pipeline for jobs like mine. Diverse groups generate better ideas and more innovative solutions."
.
Rebecca hopes to inspire other women to step up to the challenge, and for people managers to look at ways to develop the women on their teams.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cBe comfortable standing out. Believe in yourself and your abilities. Opportunities will not find you; you need to find the opportunities,\xe2\x80\x9d
.
.
#IWD #WomensMonth #LifeAtROK #WomenROK #STEMinist #IWD2020'

b"As we look ahead to #InternationalWomensDay, we're highlighting the work of awesome women at our company, like Bianca Soares.
.
Bianca became the co-leader of the local and regional Professional Women\xe2\x80\x99s Council  and recipient of the World Class Initiative Award from the Rockwell Automation Women in the Field (RAWiFi) employee resource group.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cThat\xe2\x80\x99s when my professional life at Rockwell really took shape. I became more aware of the resources available to expand my skills and my responsibility to grow my own career.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
Bianca is not only involved in employee resource groups, but mentorship as well. These relationships have helped her grow both in skills and her appreciation for diversity.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cI hope to help other women by being a mentor to as many as I can. I want to inspire others, keep the ERGs active and worthwhile, and do whatever I can to show women that they can change the world by being their best selves.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
.
#IWD #WomensMonth #LifeAtROK #WomenROK #STEMinist #IWD2020"

b'#InternationalWomensDay is around the corner and we're celebrating by sharing the story of our own Kristin Roth. Kristin leads complex product developments across global locations. It\xe2\x80\x99s a role that lends itself to her continuous learning mindset.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cI regularly reach out to people to learn more about their organization and opportunities to expand my knowledge in those areas."
.
Kristin recently assumed the role of president for the African American Professional Network employee resource group in Milwaukee and was selected as an honoree for the 2020 STEP Ahead Awards.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cI hope to help women who are new to this company, or new to a role, by being what some have been to me \xe2\x80\x93 a friend, an advocate, a mentor and a sponsor."
.
.
.
#IWD #WomensMonth #LifeAtROK #WomenROK #STEMinist #IWD2020'

b'We're celebrating #InternationalWomensDay by featuring women that ROK all through the month. Today\xe2\x80\x99s spotlight is Ramya Ramadurai.
.
Ramya considers herself a core technologist and uses her technical expertise not only to benefit our customers, but also her local tech community.
.
"We\xe2\x80\x99re at the cusp of an amazing, economically diverse community that\xe2\x80\x99s just going to thrive in the future.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
Ramya is passionate about seeing women become their best\xe2\x80\x94especially those pursuing technical careers. So it\xe2\x80\x99s not surprising she\xe2\x80\x99s mentored women and girls in many circles of her community.
.
"Working with people, solving problems and doing those things that help Rockwell Automation build a more secure world gives me the greatest satisfaction."
.
.
.
#IWD #WomensMonth #LifeAtROK #iwd2020 #WomenROK #STEMinist'

b'We're celebrating #InternationalWomensDay by featuring women that ROK all through the month, and Gwenn Peters is no exception. Recently honored as one of the @milwaukeebusinessjournal's #40under40, Gwenn is a trailblazer for women in industry.
.
"I can serve my community even better by leveraging my technical expertise to grow computer science in classrooms or help startup companies succeed.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
Gwenn is involved with  organizations like MKE Tech, and through these experiences she\xe2\x80\x99s learned every local tech job created supports an additional three jobs in the regional economy.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cTech Advancement is\xe2\x80\x8b an important area for our company to participate in. Fortunately, working for a company like Rockwell, we have many ways to engage in community service."
.
In her community and in her professional interactions, Gwenn is a role model and mentor, encouraging others through words and actions to take on new roles and embrace out of the box thinking.
.
.
.
#IWD #WomensMonth #LifeAtROK #WomenROK #RockwellAutomation'

b"Today we're celebrating #BlackHistoryMonth by featuring the inspiring work of our very own Marcus Taylor.  His work truly is changing lives.
.
Marcus is passionate about making a difference in the lives of @milwaukeemps youth through volunteering with #Lead2Change.
.
Through Lead2Change, MPS students are exposed to the skills and tools needed to be successful after high school, whether they choose an apprentice program, technical school or university. .
His mentorship has helped place students at engineering internships, including at Rockwell Automation, and two of his students recently earned full-ride scholarships to top-tier universities.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cFor me, the biggest honor is these outcomes,\xe2\x80\x9d said Marcus. \xe2\x80\x9cThese students feel better about themselves and what they offer to the world. My message to them is, you have infinite potential. If you keep your minds and hearts open, and choose a company like Rockwell Automation, you will have infinite opportunities.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
#engineeringinterns #STEM #STEMmentor #STEMEducation"

b"We're celebrating #BlackHistoryMonth by featuring the inspiring work of our very own Shari Briggs.  She is the first recipient of our African American Professional Network (AAPN) Volunteer of the Year award. It\xe2\x80\x99s a fitting tribute to a woman dedicated to service.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cI am a black woman with an engineering degree so that makes me part of a small group, yet as soon as I walked in the door of our company, I had a group of people ready to expand my network personally and professionally, and help me succeed,\xe2\x80\x9d Shari said. \xe2\x80\x9cThat genuine concern and effort confirmed what I suspected: this is a place where I would have a thriving career.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
Shari\xe2\x80\x99s path toward an engineering degree is uncommon for many underrepresented groups \xe2\x80\x93 something she wants to change.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cMany young people lack confidence in their math and science skills, and don\xe2\x80\x99t have STEM role models so they don\xe2\x80\x99t envision the career for themselves,\xe2\x80\x9d she said. \xe2\x80\x9cI am working to remove those barriers so they see a way forward.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
#diversity #STEM #STEMINIST #STEMEducation #LifeAtROK"

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating #BlackHistoryMonth by featuring the inspiring work of our very own Marzell Brown.
.
There\xe2\x80\x99s no job title that precisely explains what Marzell Brown does, and few words capture who he is.
.
He\xe2\x80\x99s eager to introduce young people to STEM, and make manufacturing a place people want to be \xe2\x80\x93 especially women and underrepresented youth.
.
\xe2\x80\x9cMy passion is in developing our next generation of engineers and giving back to our communities,\xe2\x80\x9d said Marzell. \xe2\x80\x9cAnd through my work and the support of our company, I can do both.\xe2\x80\x9d
.
Dedicated and focused on student success, Marzell participates in a vast array of community, collegiate, advisory and professional boards to influence education and prepare students for a successful future.
.
#STEM #futureengineer #LifeatROK'

b"Looking back on #NationalDonorDay, there are thousands of people on waiting lists for a life-saving transplant. But #CuriousPeopleWonder, what if there was no waiting list? :beating_heart:
.
The science to create lab-grown organs is already possible, but until now hasn't been scalable. :chart_increasing:
.
With our automation technologies in partnership with ARMI / Biofab, we're helping take this science from the lab :petri_dish: to the production line :gear_selector:, with potential to go from creating a few tissues in a lab to tens of thousands of tissues in a year!
.
The Tissue Foundry is just another example of how we're #expandinghumanpossibility with automation. What do you wonder about? .
.
Visit the #linkinbio for more :right_arrow_selector:rok.auto/2H4pMyU
.
.

b'Have you heard of #virtualization? HINT: It's probably not what you think!
.
This #TechTuesday, we're defining the difference between virtualization and #virtualreality. VR is the one with headsets, games and GIF-worthy moments of people reaching out to "touch" something that isn't really there. Virtualization is just as cool!
.
It lets you create virtual versions of machines to make management of software and applications more efficient! This saves space, time & cost.
.
How can you make virtualization a reality? Check out the VersaVirtual Appliance:trade_mark: at the #linkinbio!
.
.
.

b"It's #TechTuesday! We're defining another technical term you've seen us use, but maybe don't know what it means. #CuriousPeopleWonder what ''LOTO'' means:
.
LOTO, or lockout/tagout, isn't your chance to win big with a scratch off lottery ticket... BUT a compliant LOTO program can significantly increase the odds of your plant having an exemplary safety record.
.
The proper shutdown and locking or tagging of equipment and machines can help protect workers from unexpected releases of energy while they perform maintenance or service, or start the machine back up. Bottom line? LOTO helps manufacturers keep their employees safe on the job.
.
Still #curious? learn more at the #linkinbio!
.
rok.auto/3a6BrL1"

b'Happy #TechTuesday! Ever see an article or social post about the latest in technology but not understand a single word? You're not alone! #CuriousPeopleWonder what things mean, and we're here to shed light on this week's technical term: Greenfield
.
Greenfield refers to starting a project from scratch rather than working from something that already exists. This can relate to a physical project or even a digital one!
.
So, next time you see that a project is referred to as "greenfield," you'll know it's being innovated from the ground up! Have a technical term or phrase you want featured for a future #TechTuesday post? Submit it in the comments!
.
.
.
#technologytuesday #technologythesedays #whatif #whatdoesitmean #STEMeducation'
